original_text: Death only has power to hurt us because of our sins. And it is the authority of God's Law that gives power to sins.
korean_text: 사망이 쏘는 것은 죄요 죄의 권능은 율법이라

sentences.original_text: Death only has power to hurt us
sentences.korean_translation: 사망은 우리를 상하게 할 힘만 가지고 있다

sentences.original_text: And it is the authority of God's Law
